function.name: washing_startCourse
function.description: This function is used to start the washing process of the washing machine on a specific course.

location.description: The location where the device which needs to be turned on is located.

room.description: The room where the device which needs to be turned on is located.

device.description: The device on which action needs to be performed.

compartment.description: The predefined compartment of the device, in which action needs to be performed.

mode.description: The mode in which device needs to be set.
